name: water-abstraction-acceptance-tests
description: Automated acceptance tests for the Water Abstraction Service

scripts.cy:run:local: npm run cy:reports:delete && cypress run --e2e --env environment=local
scripts.cy:run:dev: npm run cy:reports:delete && cypress run --e2e --env environment=dev
scripts.cy:run:tst: npm run cy:reports:delete && cypress run --e2e --env environment=tst
scripts.cy:run:pre: npm run cy:reports:delete && cypress run --e2e --env environment=pre
scripts.cy:run:ci: npm run cy:reports:delete && cypress run --e2e --env environment=ci

author: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs
